title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Early Jerry Distractions, Dak Concerns
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Early Jerry Distractions, Dak Concerns
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why he disagrees with Big Ben calling out younger players after his legendarily lukewarm commitment.

Then, longtime Cowboys columnist - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin from Oxnard to discuss Jerry Jones creating early distractions with his backhanded ‘vote of confidence’ for Mike McCarthy (10:00), if the Cowboys competitive window is closing (13:00), what it would take for Mike McCarthy to get fired during the season (25:00), if the loss of Amari Cooper will hurt Dak’s production (32:00), and why Oklahoma fans can’t get over Lincoln Riley leaving for USC (40:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
